plot: Nancy and Jonathan follow a lead, Steve and Robin sign on to a secret mission, and Max and Eleven go shopping. A rattled Billy has troubling visions.

Billy succeeds to escape and when he stops his car in a phone booth to report what happened to the police, weird creature approaches and he sees himself among them. Mike misses the date with El without explanation and when she calls him, he lies to her. There is a mob protesting the loss of jobs caused by the new Starcourt Mall and Kline presses Hopper to stop them. Dustin meets Steve and asks him to help to translate the Russian message that is encoded and Robin asks to join them. El and Max go to the mall for shopping and Mike tries to find a gift for El. Nancy and Jonathan decide to investigate a lead at Mrs. Driscoll's home about rabies rats. Billy is dizzy with flashbacks in the Upside Down. Joyce stands Hopper up at the restaurant.—Claudio Carvalho, Rio de Janeiro, Brazil
